Asks player to collect materials so he can create thermodynamic heatsinks to impress Litzi. Player has to get a heat sink for final tests. They can ask for it or steal it.
Player gets message to start quest
Incoming message from Temir, {PlayerFullName}.
I'd like to speak with you about a personal project that might also interest you. Come see me please.\n-Temir Umarov
Player speaks to Temir
Hey, Temir! Tell me more about your personal project.
I have a question for you first, if you don't mind... Has Litzi ever mentioned me?
Not by name, no. Is she involved with your project?
Directly? No, but I'm hoping to use it to impress her and get a position on her team.
She's already got two apprentices. I don't know if she's looking right now.
I don't want to knock anyone else out of their spot, but I haven't worked in weeks and Litzi would be my top choice for boss. Better than Tau, that's for sure.
That's a low bar, Temir. *haha* Maybe I can help, though. What's your project?

Well, you know I'm big into thermodynamics. I've been working on advanced heat sink tech that could extend the life of almost any machine. It's unorthodox, but I believe my theory is sound. I just need a few more tests and for you to get me one of the power plant's current heat sinks.
Me? Why not just ask for one?

It might not look like it, but the power plant is a pretty restricted area. If you don't have official business there, Litzi is quick to turn you away, and most of the doors are locked out of necessity. I have no leverage there, so a heat sink isn't something I could just ask for.
...But you could, since you already have a connection with the team. I wouldn't need the heat sink long, either. Just long enough to run some tests.
Okay, I'll see what I can do.

{PlayerFullName}'s a team player. As long as we get it back by the end of the day, we should be fine to give up one heat sink. Fang?

Okay, you convinced me. Take these gloves, and wear them while you take one of the heat sinks. Bring it back as soon as possible, though.
Thanks, Litzi. I'll be fast.
I've unlocked the heat sink room door for you. You should be able to just walk in.
